title: Was Game 1 A Fluke?
description:
Domonique Foxworth, Israel Gutierrez and Spencer Hall debate if Game 1 of the NBA Finals was a fluke and if Tua proved the “Twitter warriors” wrong by throwing two good passes in practice.
